QuestData.Title: Demons in the Citadel
QuestData.Description: One of our scouts brought back unpleasant news. We've spotted a powerful agent of the Burning Legion in the ramparts!$B$BI need you to kill this demon before he has a chance to relay news of our efforts to his superiors.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Omor the Unscarred and bring his hoof to Stone Guard Stok'ton.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to dispose of the foul creature?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. We need the time you've bought us to investigate this link between the fel orcs and the Burning Legion. You very well may have saved hundreds of lives through your actions.
